Pre-Game Insights: Scotland has selected a largely unchanged XV with only four players missing out from the last World Cup.
The side will be captained by 37-year-old veteran Richie Berrington.
Chris Sole, Brad Currie, Mark Watt, and George Munsey are key players for Scotland.
Scotland has form in this regard; having not won a single game against a fellow European nation in a T20 World Cup in three previous attempts.
